name: Malacca
description: Malacca (Malay: Melaka; Tamil: மலாக்கா; Chinese: 馬六甲; pinyin: Mǎlùjiǎ or Mǎliùjiǎ; Pe̍h-ōe-jī: mála̍kkah; dubbed "The Historic State"; Malay: "Bandar Raya Bersejarah")[14] is a state in Malaysia located in the southern region of the Malay Peninsula, next to the Strait of Malacca.
